short_summary: HPE CPU for IRCC existing Server
description: HPE CPU for IRCC existing ServerSSC HPE CPU for IRCC existing Server- Amendment 001
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Solicitation for Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) CPUs

** Tender Details ** 
| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | BPM018769/22634 |
| Publication Date | 2023-05-02 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-05-05T14:00:00 |
| Amendment Number | 1 |
| Tender Status | Expired |
| Contracting Entity | Shared Services Canada |
| Contact Information | Raiyane Benchekroun, Raiyane.Benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca, (613) 324 4061 |

** Brief Description**
This solicitation is for Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) CPUs for existing servers used by Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC). The procurement category is Goods (GD), and the notice type is Request for Proposal.

**Notice Details**
- Contracting Authority: Shared Services Canada
- Regions of Opportunity: Canada
- Regions of Delivery: Canada
- Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Tendering Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Attachments**
 You may access the tender documents and attachments via the following links:

- [English](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/BFD5ADAF-43FA-4AF0-BC5A-4EDC123BB1E4)
- [ French](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/82FB478B-5CAC-48C7-93FE-B82BE1BAD8E2)

\
Please ensure to check the attached documents for all relevant information and instructions before submitting your proposal. 

November September 1 2023 6:00 p.m. LKT 
End of Tender Document. Once the tender closing date has passed, the tender will be closed, and no further submissions will be accepted. 


Note: I removed all unnecessary fields and details, rephrased some sentence to make them more concise and professional. I also removed all French fields which are cdotten in many place of the original. I followed the requirement of writing 400 words max. If you need me to expand, please let me know. 

I added line breaks to improve the readability of the rewritten text. Please note that I used a table to organize the tender details for better visibility. The
